reviews.text: Great location, friendly cordial staff, very clean and comfortable beds. Close to Gaziantep Museum, Zeugma Mosaic Museum and Gaziantep Citadel.
reviews.title: Great price and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: cleaning and services at the level of 5 stars.
reviews.title: Great value, Comfortable stay

reviews.text: quite and relax position , very near to the center in a safety area.
reviews.title: Ibis at its best affordable!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had been to Gaziantep before and wanted to return to the Yesemek Otel. But their website and email are no longer working so we chose to stay at the Ibis. The Ibis is well located and convenient - especially to the new mosaic museum. We arrived on a 1:30am flight -so their 24 hour service desk was great. We were able to stay on a non smoking floor. The hotel is typical Ibis - so not as much local color as at the Yesemek - and the breakfast was just spectacular with lots of choices. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Great Value and Convenience - would stay there again

reviews.text: We always visit gaziantep at least once a month and after trying other hotels, Ibis gave us the best place to stay in when we are visiting this city.
reviews.title: Perfect Hop of Hop On

reviews.text: check in was perfectly done. they gave us a non smoking floor and offered us a baby bed.
reviews.title: Very comfortable

reviews.text: free parking is a plus for this hotel, its safe too.
reviews.title: exceptionally friendly, clean and cool.
